long_description: The Granite Gear Serrano 25 Pack offers plenty of pockets to organize daily adventures and travels, along with a hydration sleeve/port and side water-bottle holsters to keep you well-watered. Padded shoulder straps. Sternum strap with buckle that works as a whistle. Internal zippered pocket; external zippered pockets; mesh front pocket; dual bottle holsters. Trekking pole attachment. The Granite Gear Serrano 25 Pack features a hydration port and sleeve (reservoir sold separately). Closeout.
short_description: The Granite Gear Serrano 25 Pack offers plenty of pockets to organize daily adventures and travels, along with a hydration sleeve/port and side water-bottle holsters to keep you well-watered.
